citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 c 3
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the semiannual reports for the year 2017 were forwarded to the IO
without any signatures by the IACUC members as required by the regulations.
The IACUC needs to insure semiannual report are signed by a majority of IACUC members .
Correct from this day 2/13/2018
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Chair of the IACUC

narrative:
2.31(c)(3)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
Item IACUC 2.31 c 3 
At the time of inspection it was  noticed that the semiannual reports for the year 2017 were forwarded to the IO
without any signatures by the IACUC members  as required by the regulations.
The IACUC needs to insure semiannual report are signed by a majority of IACUC members .
                                                                                             Correct from this day 2/13/2018
The inspection and exit interview  were conducted with the Chair of the IACUC
